content.question: The words ponti truculentum . . . aequor (line 3) are translated

choices.label: a trusty surface for the bridge
the bumpy planking for the bridge
the muddy bottom of the sea
the stormy surface of the sea

content.answer: the stormy surface of the sea

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
